06-08

1. Rabbit MQ

  • schemed throughy the amqp spec (about 40 pages) - only organized section 2 on my blog post
  • went through the RabbitMQ tutorial on its official website

While peer reviewing rabbit mq connection test code, I found that either channel or connection exception results in an amqp connection close. It was also mentioned in 2.3.6 of error handling of amqp spec.

2. Clean Code

  • Wanted to write something about clean code but didn't have time to work on that blog post.
